title: Meditation Eye Mask
cleaned_text: Preview Meditation Eye Mask Sign in or create account to view wholesale pricing $33.00 SRP Story Filled with lavender and flaxseed and backed by 100% silk dupioni, our eye mask will serve as the perfect calming retreat after a challenging day or for your savasana after a challenging yoga practice. Select from any of our very colorful textile designs. Handwoven with non-toxic dyed sheep wool.
